/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and motorcycles can be seen in the distance, indicating a busy traffic flow. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
